description: Main front-end source code for the Notes application built using Flutter. Sets up application initialization, UI structure with theme and navigation, and integrates state management via provider for notes.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: The root widget that initializes state management and sets theme, title, and home page for the application.

classes.name: NotesHomePage
classes.description: Main page displaying list of notes with options to create, edit, delete, or categorize notes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Initializes Flutter bindings, loads environment variables, sets up Supabase, and runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the root app, setting up ChangeNotifierProvider, MaterialApp, and theme.

methods.name: _showNoteDialog
methods.description: Displays a dialog for creating or editing a note, then updates the provider accordingly.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a note.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the main UI of the home page, including app bar, drawer, body with search and list of notes, and floating action button.
